title: School Reopening Notice
content: We are pleased to announce that the school will reopen on January, 2026. Please check your emails for further instructions.

title: Examination Schedule Released
content: The examination schedule for the upcoming term has not been released. Please refer to the notice for details and timings.

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting
content: we just did our meeting of the year 2025 and we will notify on the next school meeting for 2026

title: Library Book Submission Reminder
content: Students are reminded to return their borrowed library books before the due date, to avoid late fines.

title: Science Fair Registration Open
content: Registrations for the Tertiary courses is underway for 2026 January classes.

title: New School Uniform Guidelines
content: Starting January 2026, new uniform guidelines will be implemented. Please check the school website for details.
